message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $12500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13500. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings you and my own costs. Let's meet in the middle and finalize this deal.
I understand you're trying to make a deal, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $13500. How about we meet in the middle from your last offer? I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product.
